step.cmd: To see the latest activity on a board, click Show Menu on the top menu bar of the board.
step.info: Each user action is logged under Activity with a short message and a timestamp. For example: Admin added User1 to CardXYZ yesterday at 6:32 PM or User1 added ListABC to this board a few seconds ago.

step.cmd: To see the activity on a card, open the card.

info.p: The user actions on that card are logged in the same manner as in the board activity.

step.cmd: Use the commenting feature on the cards, to record your notes and to discuss with the team.
